title: Used Car Price Prediction
short_description: End-to-end ML pipeline: EDA, feature engineering, model selection, deployment.
full_description: Built a regression pipeline to predict used car prices using Python (pandas, scikit-learn). Applied feature engineering for age, drivetrain, fuel type, and mileage. Tuned tree-based models and evaluated with cross-validation, then exposed a simple prediction app for business users.
problem_statement: Estimate fair market value of used cars to improve resale pricing and reduce inventory holding costs.
approach: Data profiling and cleaning; feature engineering (age, brand segments); model benchmarking (Random Forest, XGBoost, LightGBM); SHAP for explainability; Streamlit for inference UI.
insights: Feature importance showed mileage, age, and brand segment as the top drivers. Reduced mispricing risk and improved pricing consistency.

title: Customer Churn Analysis & Retention
short_description: Churn risk scoring and driver analysis to prioritize retention actions.
full_description: Built a churn propensity model and driver analysis to identify high-risk cohorts. Combined SQL cohorting, Python modeling, and BI storytelling for stakeholders.
problem_statement: Reduce churn and protect recurring revenue by targeting high-risk cohorts with tailored offers.
approach: Cohort analysis in SQL; feature engineering (tenure, usage, support tickets, payments); model with XGBoost; SHAP for drivers; dashboard for business teams.
insights: Support tickets and payment failures were top churn signals; targeting top decile risk improved retention lift vs. baseline.

title: Sales Performance BI Dashboard
short_description: Executive Power BI dashboard for revenue, margin, and regional performance.
full_description: Designed a BI dashboard to monitor revenue, margin, and growth across regions and segments. Built DAX measures for YoY, variance, and contribution analysis.
problem_statement: Give leadership a single source of truth for sales performance and margin health.
approach: Modeled fact/dimension tables; created DAX KPIs (YoY, MoM, mix); built drill-through for region/segment; published to Power BI Service.
insights: Identified margin erosion in two regions and surfaced top underperforming SKUs for targeted action.

title: Product AB Test Evaluation
short_description: Designed and evaluated an experiment to measure conversion lift with clean stats.
full_description: Evaluated an A/B test for a product funnel change. Checked randomization, ran power analysis, measured lift with confidence intervals, and provided decision guidance.
problem_statement: Determine whether variant improves conversion without harming retention or revenue per user.
approach: Pre-test power calc; randomization checks; difference-in-proportions test; delta method CI; holdout on retention; readout with recommendations.
insights: Variant lifted signup conversion by ~4.2pp with 95% CI [1.1pp, 7.3pp]; recommended ship with monitoring on retention.

title: Oil Spill Classification using ML
short_description: Machine Learning-Based Ocean Patch Classification Dataset: Predicting Oil Spills in Satellite Images through Advanced Feature Analysis.
full_description: Built a classification model to detect oil spills in satellite images using machine learning techniques. Applied feature engineering and various ML algorithms to achieve high accuracy.
problem_statement: Detect and classify oil spills in satellite imagery to enable rapid environmental response.
approach: Image preprocessing, feature extraction, model training with multiple algorithms (Random Forest, SVM, Neural Networks), evaluation and optimization.
insights: Achieved high classification accuracy enabling faster detection and response to environmental incidents.

title: Impact Of Car Features - EDA & Dashboarding
short_description: Unveiling Market Dynamics: Exploring the Influence of Car Features on Selling Prices through in-depth Analysis with Python, Excel, and Power BI.
full_description: Comprehensive EDA study analyzing how different car features impact selling prices. Created interactive dashboards in Power BI and Excel to visualize key insights.
problem_statement: Understand which car features drive pricing decisions in the used car market.
approach: Data cleaning and EDA in Python, feature correlation analysis, dashboard creation in Power BI and Excel, visualization of key drivers.
insights: Identified top features affecting car prices including mileage, age, brand, and fuel type.
